yds 1 skein baby 150 yds 2 skeins toddler 175 yds 2 skeins child/small adult 200 yds 2 skeins adult 250 yds 3 skeins large adult 275 yds 3 skeins **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain round- round single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split
